Detailed Description

Substance hardware resource dispatching requirements structure def.

Field Documentation

unsigned char SubstanceHardResources::gpusUse[SUBSTANCE_GPU_COUNT_MAX]

GPUs use hints. SubstanceHardSwitch enum value.

Dispatch Substance computation load on GPUs

unsigned char SubstanceHardResources::cpusUse[SUBSTANCE_CPU_COUNT_MAX]

CPUs use hints. SubstanceHardSwitch enum value.

Dispatch Substance computation load on CPUs

unsigned char SubstanceHardResources::spusUse[SUBSTANCE_SPU_COUNT_MAX]

SPUs use hints. SubstanceHardSwitch enum value.

Dispatch Substance computation load on SPUs (Streaming processors units)

size_t SubstanceHardResources::systemMemoryBudget

System memory budget.

Note:
Set the maximum amount of system memory that Substance can use. 0: no limitations.

size_t SubstanceHardResources::videoMemoryBudget[SUBSTANCE_GPU_COUNT_MAX]

System video budget per GPU.

Note:
Set the maximum amount of system memory that Substance can use. 0: no limitations.
